New Records: Kevin Durant officially made 10,000 field goal attempts
Key Match Events: Phoenix avoided a late collapse to ultimately defeat Portland 103-97
Devin Booker led all scorers with six points in the first quarter
Phoenix reached their largest lead of the game (26 points)
The Suns outscored Portland 44-18 in the third quarter
Portland went on a 24-4 scoring run to draw within eight points with three minutes left
Booker hit the free throw line to push the Suns up by six with only seconds remaining
Others: Devin Booker - 28 points, nine assists, nine rebounds
